  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205242</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Finding Racial Stereotypes in Popular Culture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden der rassischen Stereotypen in der 
populären Kultur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conclusion des stéréotypes raciaux dans la 
culture populaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrando stereotypes raciais na cultura 
popular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Individuazione degli stereotipi razziali nella 
coltura popolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εύρεση των φυλετικών στερεοτύπων στο δημοφιλή 
πολιτισμό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encontrar estereotipos raciales en cultura 
popular</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson students analyze current media and determine if racial stereotyping exists and consider causes of and remedies for racial stereotyping.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion analysieren Kursteilnehmer 
aktuelle Media und stellen fest, wenn rassisches stereotyping 
existiert und betrachten Ursachen von und Hilfsmittel für rassisches 
stereotyping.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon les étudiants analysent des 
medias actuels et déterminent si le stéréotype racial existe et 
considèrent des causes de et des remèdes pour le stéréotype 
racial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição os estudantes analisam media atuais 
e determinam se stereotyping racial existir e consideram causas de e 
remédios para stereotyping racial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione allievi analizzano i media 
correnti e determinano se stereotipare razziale esiste e considerano 
le cause di ed i rimedi a stereotipare razziale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα οι σπουδαστές αναλύουν τα παρόντα 
μέσα και καθορίζουν εάν φυλετικό να στερεοτυπήσει υπάρχει και 
εξετάζουν τις αιτίες και τις θεραπείες για φυλετικά να 
στερεοτυπήσουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección los estudiantes analizan media 
actuales y se determinan si existe la estereotipia racial y consideran
causas de y los remedios para la estereotipia racial.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
